item.title: US GOLD CORP 10-K
item.description: US GOLD CORP, which is in the Metal Mining [1000] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 15, 2022 had 27602 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 456 instances stock - 428 instances gold - 311 instances 2022 - 258 instances common - 246 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
